original_text: On another Jewish day of rest, Jesus went into the Jewish meeting place and he taught the people. A man was there. His right hand had become small and weak and he could not use it.
korean_text: 또 다른 안식일에 예수께서 회당에 들어가사 가르치실새 거기 오른손 마른 사람이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: On another Jewish day of rest
Jesus went into the Jewish meeting place
His right hand had become small and weak
and he could not use it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그것을 사용할 수 없었습니다
